name: Bruschetta con Crema
description: Grilled bread topped with roasted garlic cream, roasted sweet peppers and dusted with Parmeggiano Reggiano.

name: Spiedini di Albiocca
description: Tart, sweet dried apricots wrapped with Prosciutto di Parma.

name: Tortino de Gorgonzola
description: An individual Gorgonzola and mascarpone cheesecake topped with toasted walnuts and served with black pepper grissini.

name: Bucatini all'Amatriciana
description: With tomatoes, pancetta, white onion, white whine and garlic.

name: Rigatoni alla Siciliana
description: Grilled eggplant with fresh Mozzarella, Pecorino Romano, and marinara.

name: Paglia e Fieno
description: Handmade fresh spinach tagliatelle topped with peas, Prosciutto di Parma, and Parmeggiano Reggiano.

name: Orecchiette con Rapini
description: Grilled rapini and fennel sausage with Pecorino Romano, garlic and white wine.

name: Pappardelle con Coniglio
description: Braised rabbit with vegetables, garlic and white wine.

name: Margherita
description: The classic Italian pizza, made with imported Italian tomatoes, mozarella and fresh basil, topped with parmesan cheese.

name: Sicilian
description: A spicy marinara sauce with sweet Italian sausage, spicy Capicola ham, salami, Fontina, mozzarella and parmesan, topped with fresh oregano and basil.

name: Chicken Florentine
description: Ricotta cheese cream sauce, tender roast chicken and spinach.

name: Zuppa di Giorno
description: Served with homemade breadsticks.

name: Minestrone Piemontese
description: Classic Italian soup with orzo pasta, vegetables and cannellini beans in tomato broth.

name: Zuppa de Pesce
description: A broth-style seafood soup full of scallops, prawns and halibut, seasoned with fresh Italian herbs.

name: Insalata Mista
description: Greens tossed with crumbled Gorgonzola cheese and Cerignola olives in our house dressing.

name: Insalata Rucola
description: Arugula with sundried tomato, fennel, red onion and walnuts tossed in our basil Gorgonzola dressing.

name: Insalata Fagioli
description: Cannellini beans, imported tuna and white onions on mixed greens.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Layers of chocolate cake, sprinkled with Marsala and filled with freshly made chocolate zabaglione.

name: Zuccotto
description: Updside-down Italian cake filled with chocolate and hazelnut mousse and dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Tiramisu
description: Italian ladyfingers soaked in espresso, layered with sweet mascarpone cheese.

name: Sparkling Water
description: Perrier or San Peligrino.

name: Soda
description: Any fountain drink. Unlimited refills.

name: Coffee and Brewed Decaf
description: Available hot or cold.

name: Capuccino or Americano
description: Americano can be made with two shots of espresso.
